tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: First thing which triggered me to dental clinic is that I started noticing black deposit on my lower jaws, initially I neglected it for a long  time since I didn't experience any bleeding gums or pain or sensitivity and  I thought that it can be removed by brushing ,I  started brushing it regularly and vigorously but no use . Then i searched for dental clinic . Dr Sujatha at Power Smile Dental Clinic examined me carefully and identified that I have periodontitis. She is very experienced in the field and explains each and every step of the treatment in detail. She is friendly enough, you to talk about your dental problems without any hesitation.  Periodontitis is such a serious problems which should be treated before it get worse. After consulting her it was big relief to me to know that I can save my teeth . Treatment went very smoothly at a reasonable cost. Am already seeing the difference and feeling better. Lots of thanks and good wishes to Dr Sujatha.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Had a good experience .the Doctor was friendly and patient  .I didn't have to wait long for my appointment  ,would definitely recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: For a person who is very scared of Dentists, *** ******* *** ** *** **** ****** * ********** She explains the problem in a language a common man understands and suggests the best solution. My wisdom tooth had to be extracted surgically. Right from the diagnosis to the removal of stitches, the process was very hassle-free. I have had multiple bad experiences with dentists previously. This tooth extraction process has been bliss and all thanks to Dr. Sujatha.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
We have been visiting Dr Sujatha for almost 2 to 3 months now for our son who is 4.5 years old. 
She has been a blessing in our life and we are extremely happy with the treatment she has offered our son who had a lot of work to be done for his tiny teeth.

context: General  Dentistry,Cast Partial Denture,Re-Root Canal Treatment,
review: Firstly was very impressed with their sanitization process of the patient before entering the clinic.Secondly , thorough examination of the patient and most importantly guided and explained in detail about the procedures and adviced the best method considering the patient's health.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Sujata explained the current problem and shared ways to avoid build up of tartar by flossing.She explained in simple ,easy to follow language.She has a wonderful recall of my family history as well as my previous appointments. 
The clinic is a pleasant and welcoming place, and hygenically maintained ,especially in these times. Staff too is pleasant and friendly. 
Definitely recommend, especially as I  have been visiting for the past 12-13 years

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: The doctor was thorough and kind. She explained the situation and diagnostic really well. The cleanliness was impeccable. When you enter, they take to disinfect you and give a hair cap, plastic gloves etc. I really like how she explained the situation in my teeth. I opted for teeth scaling. I found the cost a little pricey to be honest. I wish they could get down the price on mere scaling. But I went ahead with it any way. She then sat me down and even gave me a demonstration of how to brush my teeth on a teeth model. Overall it was a good experience. Thank you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Sujatha took the time out to explain my dental condition to me and took time to explain post tooth removal care. The whole process was seamless.
